setInt32()从DataView起始位置以byte为计数的指定偏移量(byteOffset)处储存一个32-bit数(长整型).

The source for this interactive example is stored in a GitHub repository. If you'd like to contribute to the interactive examples project, please clone https://github.com/mdn/interactive-examples and send us a pull request.

语法

dataview.setInt32(byteOffset, value [, littleEndian])

参数

byteOffset
偏移量,从头开始计算,单位为字节.
value
设置的数值.
littleEndian
可选 Indicates whether the 32-bit int is stored in little- or big-endian format. If false or undefined, a big-endian value is written.

返回

undefined.

抛出错误

RangeError
如果byteOffset超出了视图能储存的值,就会抛出错误.

例子

var buffer = new ArrayBuffer(8);
var dataview = new DataView(buffer);
dataview.setInt32(1, 3);
dataview.getInt32(1); // 3

规范

Specification Status Comment
Typed Array Specification Obsolete Superseded by ECMAScript 6.
ECMAScript 2015 (6th Edition, ECMA-262)
DataView.prototype.setInt32		 Standard Initial definition in an ECMA standard.
ECMAScript Latest Draft (ECMA-262)
DataView.prototype.setInt32		 Draft
